WDY_ENH_NEW_CODE.CODE_BODY:
method _PST_5196WTFXJ2M778MX4WAG1EHBU . "Exit of SET_FIELD_CONTROL (in ZFITV_VC_TRIP_DOCUMENTS )
DATA: lo_el_field_control TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element, lv_active TYPE char4.
lo_el_field_control = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_field_control )->get_element( ).
lv_active+3(1) = abap_true. "Busimess document
lo_el_field_control->set_attribute( EXPORTING value = lv_active name = 'VISIBILITY' ).
endmethod.

method _PST_51CTI9SCFOKBDEEJZVUXT2JI2 . "Exit of WDDOINIT (in ZFITV_VC_TRIP_DOCUMENTS )
DATA: lo_nd_field_control TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node, lo_el_field_control TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
lo_nd_field_control = wd_context->get_child_node( name = wd_this->wdctx_field_control ).
* get element via lead selection lo_el_field_control = lo_nd_field_control->get_element( ).
lo_el_field_control->set_attribute_property( EXPORTING attribute_name = 'NOTE' property = 1 value = abap_false ).
lo_el_field_control->set_attribute_property( EXPORTING attribute_name = 'URL' property = 1 value = abap_false ).
lo_el_field_control->set_attribute_property( EXPORTING attribute_name = 'ATTA' property = 1 value = abap_false ).
endmethod.
